scripts.docker:run: docker stop es7-prod; docker rm es7-prod; docker run -d -p 3000:3000 --name es7-prod es7-and-beyond
scripts.docker:run:dev: docker stop es7-dev; docker rm es7-dev; docker run -d -p 3000:3000 -p 5858:5858 -p 35729:35729 -v $PWD:/var/app -v es7-node-modules:/var/app/node_modules --name es7-dev es7-and-beyond:dev
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop es7-dev es7-prod; docker rm es7-dev es7-prod; docker rmi es7-and-beyond es7-and-beyond:dev; exit 0
